Allocation of purchase consideration to identifiable assets and liabilities affects our amortization expense, as"}],[{"top":250.41,"left":23.8,"width":564.7899780273438,"height":4.46999979019165,"text":"acquired finite-lived intangible assets are amortized over the useful life, whereas any indefinite lived intangible assets, including goodwill, are not amortized."}],[{"top":260.02,"left":23.8,"width":564.7900390625,"height":4.46999979019165,"text":"During the measurement period, which is not to exceed one year from the acquisition date, we may record adjustments to the assets acquired and liabilities"}],[{"top":269.62,"left":23.8,"width":551.7099609375,"height":4.46999979019165,"text":"assumed, with the corresponding offset to goodwill. The analysis may include both qualitative and quantitative factors to assess the likelihood"}],[{"top":348.85,"left":23.8,"width":564.7999877929688,"height":4.46999979019165,"text":"of an impairment, which occurs when the carrying value of a reporting unit exceeds its fair value. Significant judgment is required in estimating the fair value of"}],[{"top":358.45,"left":23.8,"width":564.7900390625,"height":4.46999979019165,"text":"our reporting units to determine if the fair values of those units exceed their carrying values and an impairment to goodwill is required when a quantitative"}],[{"top":368.05,"left":23.8,"width":564.7900390625,"height":4.46999979019165,"text":"goodwill impairment test is performed. We typically obtain the assistance of third-party valuation specialists to help in determining the fair value of our reporting"}],[{"top":377.66,"left":23.8,"width":564.800048828125,"height":4.46999979019165,"text":"units. The fair values of our reporting units are estimated using a combination of the income approach, which requires estimating the present value of expected"}],[{"top":387.26,"left":23.8,"width":564.7900390625,"height":4.46999979019165,"text":"future cash flows of a reporting unit, and the market approach, which uses financial ratios of comparable companies to arrive at an estimated value for the"}],[{"top":396.87,"left":23.8,"width":564.7899780273438,"height":4.46999979019165,"text":"reporting unit. Significant estimates and assumptions used in the income approach include assessments of macroeconomic conditions, growth rates of our"}],[{"top":406.47,"left":23.8,"width":564.7899780273438,"height":4.46999979019165,"text":"reporting units in the near- and long-term, expectations of our ability to execute on our roadmap and projections, and the discount rate applied to cash flows."}],[{"top":416.07,"left":23.8,"width":564.7900390625,"height":4.46999979019165,"text":"Significant estimates used in the market approach include the identification of comparable companies for each reporting unit, the determination of an"}],[{"top":425.68,"left":23.8,"width":564.7899780273438,"height":4.46999979019165,"text":"appropriate control premium that a market participant would apply to a reporting unit, and the determination of appropriate multiples to apply to a reporting unit"}],[{"top":435.28,"left":23.8,"width":292.1600036621094,"height":4.46999979019165,"text":"based on adjustments and consideration of specific attributes of that reporting unit."}],[{"top":469.49,"left":301.75,"width":8.890002250671387,"height":4.46999979019165,"text":"43"}]]},{"extraction_method":"stream","top":0.0,"left":0.0,"width":612.0,"height":792.0,"right":612.0,"bottom":792.0,"data":[[{"top":21.58,"left":23.8,"width":56.060001373291016,"height":4.019999980926514,"text":"Table of Contents"}],[{"top":63.14,"left":23.8,"width":564.7900390625,"height":4.46999979019165,"text":"The most significant assumptions utilized in the determination of the estimated fair values of our reporting units are the sales and earnings growth rates"}],[{"top":72.75,"left":23.8,"width":564.7900390625,"height":4.46999979019165,"text":"(including long-term growth rates) and discount rates. We believe that our audit provides a reasonable basis for our opinion."}],[{"top":411.86,"left":23.8,"width":267.1199951171875,"height":4.46999979019165,"text":"Definition and Limitations of Internal Control Over Financial Reporting"}],[{"top":432.87,"left":23.8,"width":564.800048828125,"height":4.46999979019165,"text":"A company’s internal control over financial reporting is a process designed to provide reasonable assurance regarding the reliability of financial reporting and"}],[{"top":443.67,"left":23.8,"width":564.7899780273438,"height":4.46999979019165,"text":"the preparation of financial statements for external purposes in accordance with generally accepted accounting principles. A company’s internal control over"}],[{"top":453.87,"left":23.8,"width":564.7899780273438,"height":4.46999979019165,"text":"financial reporting includes those policies and procedures that (1) pertain to the maintenance of records that, in reasonable detail, accurately and fairly reflect"}],[{"top":464.08,"left":23.8,"width":564.7899780273438,"height":4.46999979019165,"text":"the transactions and dispositions of the assets of the company; (2) provide reasonable assurance that transactions are recorded as necessary to permit"}],[{"top":474.88,"left":23.8,"width":564.7900390625,"height":4.46999979019165,"text":"preparation of financial statements in accordance with generally accepted accounting principles, and that receipts and expenditures of the company are being"}],[{"top":485.09,"left":23.8,"width":564.7899780273438,"height":4.46999979019165,"text":"made only in accordance with authorizations of management and directors of the company; and (3) provide reasonable assurance regarding prevention or"}],[{"top":495.29,"left":23.8,"width":524.8699951171875,"height":4.46999979019165,"text":"timely detection of unauthorized acquisition, use, or disposition of the company’s assets that could have a material effect on the financial statements."}],[{"top":551.7,"left":301.75,"width":8.890002250671387,"height":4.46999979019165,"text":"93"}]]},{"extraction_method":"stream","top":0.0,"left":0.0,"width":612.0,"height":792.0,"right":612.0,"bottom":792.0,"data":[[{"top":21.58,"left":23.8,"width":56.060001373291016,"height":4.019999980926514,"text":"Table of Contents"}],[{"top":56.55,"left":23.8,"width":564.7899780273438,"height":4.46999979019165,"text":"Because of its inherent limitations, internal control over financial reporting may not prevent or detect misstatements. Also, projections of any evaluation of"}],[{"top":66.75,"left":23.8,"width":564.7900390625,"height":4.46999979019165,"text":"effectiveness to future periods are subject to the risk that controls may become inadequate because of changes in conditions, or that the degree of compliance"}],[{"top":77.55,"left":23.8,"width":168.0699920654297,"height":4.46999979019165,"text":"with the policies or procedures may deteriorate."}],[{"top":139.98,"left":23.8,"width":77.83000183105469,"height":4.46999979019165,"text":"/s/ Ernst \u0026 Young LLP"}],[{"top":163.38,"left":23.8,"width":71.59000396728516,"height":4.46999979019165,"text":"San Jose, California"}],[{"top":177.19,"left":23.8,"width":65.37000274658203,"height":4.46999979019165,"text":"February 27, 2023"}],[{"top":537.91,"left":301.75,"width":8.890002250671387,"height":4.46999979019165,"text":"94"}]]},{"extraction_method":"stream","top":0.0,"left":0.0,"width":612.0,"height":792.0,"right":612.0,"bottom":792.0,"data":[[{"top":21.57,"left":23.8,"width":56.060001373291016,"height":4.019999980926514,"text":"Table of Contents"}],[{"top":67.34,"left":23.8,"width":446.95001220703125,"height":4.46999979019165,"text":"ITEM 9. Internal control over financial reporting cannot provide absolute assurance of achieving"}],[{"top":440.67,"left":52.61,"width":223.6699981689453,"height":4.46999979019165,"text":"financial reporting objectives because of its inherent limitations."}],[{"top":457.48,"left":23.8,"width":564.7999877929688,"height":4.46999979019165,"text":"Internal control over financial reporting is a process that involves human diligence and compliance and is subject to lapses in judgment and breakdowns"}],[{"top":467.09,"left":23.8,"width":564.7899780273438,"height":4.46999979019165,"text":"resulting from human failures. Internal control over financial reporting also can be circumvented by collusion or improper management override. Because of"}],[{"top":476.69,"left":23.8,"width":564.7899780273438,"height":4.46999979019165,"text":"such limitations, there is a risk that material misstatements may not be prevented or detected on a timely basis by internal control over financial reporting."}],[{"top":486.29,"left":23.8,"width":564.7900390625,"height":4.46999979019165,"text":"However, these inherent limitations are known features of the financial reporting process.
